sense.def:
To subscribe to an opinion or belief
pomeni imeti neko mnenje ali prepričanje.

seg.quote: The rest of us do not subscribe to this theory.

sense.def:
To subscribe to a magazine or a newspaper
pomeni plačati določen znesek, da redno dobivamo neko revijo ali časopis.

seg.quote: I started subscribing to a morning newspaper.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To subscribe money to a charity or a campaign
pomeni redno pošiljati denar kaki dobrodelni organizaciji ali kampanji.
